abstract: Citigroup is buying the assets of the subprime lender ACC Capital Holdings, which said on Friday that it would close.
snippet: Citigroup is buying the assets of the subprime lender ACC Capital Holdings, which said on Friday that it would close.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup’s investment banking arm scooped up the assets of the troubled subprime mortgage lender ACC Capital Holdings yesterday, the same day that the struggling company announced that it was closing.

headline.main: Citigroup Buys Parts of a Troubled Mortgage Lender
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Buys Parts of a Troubled Mortgage Lender
